```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(knitr)
dat <- read_csv("cancer patient data sets 2.csv")
names(dat) <- make.names(names(dat))
dat$Level <- factor(dat$Level,
levels = c("Low","Medium","High"),
ordered = TRUE)
dat <- dat |>
mutate(High = if_else(Level == "High", 1, 0))
m1causes <- glm(High ~ Gender + Genetic.Risk + Age + Smoking + Air.Pollution + Obesity,
data = dat,
family = "binomial")
m1symptoms <- glm(High ~ Chest.Pain + Coughing.of.Blood + Shortness.of.Breath + Weight.Loss + Frequent.Cold,
data = dat,
family = "binomial")
```


```{r, echo=FALSE, symptoms-table, results='asis',fig.show='hold'}
df <- data.frame(
Estimate = c(-16.270, 1.928, -0.258,-0.052,.794,1.227,1.590),
"Standard Error" = c(1.796, 0.476, 0.142,0.014,0.102,.137,.149),
pValue = c(2.00e-16,5.14e-5,0.071,2.00e-4,1.15e-14,2.00e-16,2.00e-16),
row.names = c("Intercept","Gender", "Genetic Risk", "Age","Smoking","Air Pollution", "Obesity")
)
df_tbl <- df %>%
gt(rownames_to_stub = TRUE) %>%
tab_header(title = "Logression Coefficients For Cancer Markers")
gtsave(df_tbl, "table_markers.png")
dg <- data.frame(
Estimate = c(-18.285,0.848,1.356,-0.147,1.102,0.368),
"Standard Error" = c(1.762,0.148,0.147,0.112,0.176,0.104),
pValue = c(2e-16,1.14e-8,2e-16,0.190,3.42e-10,3.89e-4),
row.names = c("Intercept","Chest Pain","Coughing of Blood","Shortness of Breath","Weight Loss","Frequent Cold")
)
dg_tbl <- dg %>%
gt(rownames_to_stub = TRUE) %>%
tab_header(title = "Logression Coefficients For Cancer Symptoms")
gtsave(dg_tbl, "table_symptoms.png")
```

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics("table_markers.png")
knitr::include_graphics("table_symptoms.png")
```


```{r, echo=FALSE,fig.show='hold'}
dat_long <- dat |>
pivot_longer(
cols = c(Genetic.Risk, Age, Smoking, Air.Pollution, Obesity),
names_to = "Variable",
values_to = "Value"
) |>
mutate(Variable = recode(Variable, "Age" = "Age (years)"))
ggplot(dat_long, aes(x = Level, y = Value, fill = Level)) +
geom_boxplot() +
facet_wrap(~ Variable, scales = "free_y") +
scale_fill_manual(values = c("Low" = "pink", "Medium" = "turquoise", "High" = "yellow")) +
theme_bw() +
labs(title = "Personal and Environmental Predictors",
x = "Cancer Level",
y = "Value")
```


```{r, echo=FALSE,fig.show='hold'}
dat_long <- dat |>

ggplot(dat_long, aes(x = Level, y = Value, fill = Level)) +
```
